name: Zaklínač hadů
ability: Každou noc vybereš 1 živého hráče: pokud je to Démon, prohodíte si postavu i příslušnost a on je otrávený.
flavor: Effendi... I am but a humble man, but my pipe is golden and a single tune will tame the wildest djinn, Inshallah. They say that greed hangs more men than rope. But not I, Effendi... not I.
firstNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.

name: Alsaahir
ability: Each day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.
flavor: I am here because of you, and you are here because of me.

name: Zabiják
ability: Jednou za hru, během dne, veřejně označíš 1 hráče: Je-li to Démon, zemře.

name: Filozof
ability: Jednou za hru, v noci, vybereš 1 dobrou postavu: získáš její schopnost. Pokud je tato postava ve hře, stává se opilou.
flavor: If anything is real, beer is real. Drink, for tomorrow we may die.
firstNightReminder: The Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.
otherNightReminder: If the Philosopher has not used their ability: the Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token and add the 'Is the Philosopher' reminder. If the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player.

name: Alchymista
ability: Máš schopnost Přisluhovače, který není ve hře.
flavor: Visit the interior of the Earth. By rectification thou shalt find the hidden stone. Above the gold, lieth the red. Kether in Malkuth.
firstNightReminder: Show the Alchemist a not-in-play Minion token

name: Panna
ability: Když tě poprvé někdo nominuje a nominujícím je Měšťan, je ihned popraven.
flavor: I am pure. Let those who are without sin cast themselves down and suffer in my stead. My reputation shall not be stained with your venomous accusations.

name: Heretik
ability: Kdokoliv vyhraje, prohrává a kdokoliv prohraje, vyhrává (i když jsi mrtvý).
flavor: After the hail has smashed the roof and splintered the glass of the Cathedral windows, it melts again into the earth, like a dying lamb in the desert sun. Such is the parable of the madman.

name: Kráska
ability: Všichni Přisluhovači vědí, že jsi ve hře. Pokud tě jednou za hru Přisluhovač veřejně uhodne, tvůj tým prohrává.
firstNightReminder: Wake all the Minions, show them the 'This character selected you' card and the Damsel token.
otherNightReminder: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show 'You are' card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

name: Nešika
ability: Když se dozvíš o své smrti, veřejně vybereš 1 živého hráče: pokud je zlý, tvůj tým prohrává.

name: Psychopat
ability: Každý den, před nominacemi, můžeš veřejně vybrat hráče: ten zemře. Pokud jsi popraven, zemřeš, jenom když prohraješ kámen-nůžky-papír.

name: Skřet
ability: Pokud během své nominace veřejně prohlásíš, že jsi Skřet a jsi ten den popraven, tvůj tým vyhrává. If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.
flavor: You don’t want to insult the goblins. You really, really don’t. On a completely different note… can I have another piece of cake?

name: Boomdandy
ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.

name: Pukka
ability: Každou noc vybereš 1 hráče: je otrávený. Hráč otrávený předchozí noc zemře a přestane být otrávený.
flavor: You truly have been kind welcoming me into your beautiful home. I am so sorry I accidentally scratched you. A little thing. No matter. But please, take this golden toothpick as a humble token of my regret.
otherNightReminder: Pukka vybere 1 hráče. Hráč otrávený předchozí noc zemře a přestane být otrávený.

name: Vortox
ability: Každou noc* vybereš 1 hráče: ten zemře. Schopnosti Měšťanů dávají falešné informace. Pokud není někdo každý den popraven, zlo vyhrává.
flavor: Black is White. Right is Wrong. Left is Right. Up is Long. Down is Sight. Short is Blind. Follow me. Answers find.
otherNightReminder: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.
